short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds multiple filtering options to your SoundCloud feed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This addon gives you 5 extra tabs on your SoundCloud feed:
- Default: no filtering
- No reposts: don’t show reposts
- Not following: don’t show tracks from people you’re following
- Only singles: don’t show playlists or songs longer than 30 mins
- Deep cuts: only show songs by people with not many followers or songs with not many plays
